page.title: 10THE YMCA CENTRE, MAIDSTONE
page.content: People now have lots of leisure time. There are a number of activities like {roller-skating, table tennis, short {tennis, basketball, 5-a-side football, {snooker, badminton, gymnastics and {trampolining.}They have 5{squash} courts and 5{tennis}courts. Youngsters like places to go to in their spare time, and the centre has reduced rates for the unemployed. There is an{over 60's}club and a{ {toddlers}club. The Y.M.C.A. centre organise activities for school children in the school holidays. Another sport that has become popular is{B.M.X. racing}which stands for "bicycle motor cross". This sport is very dangerous and protective clothing must be worn. Every sport is supervised by a fully-trained person.
